other_tests.findings: Initial blood glucose was 180 mg/dL, repeated blood sugar was 170 mg/dL, A1c was 8.5%.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A1c was unchanged at 8% after starting long-acting insulin.

other_tests.findings: Initial blood pressure was 150/96 mm Hg, remained in the 150- to 160-mm Hg range.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Blood pressure was recorded at 154/92 mm Hg before admission.

other_tests.findings: Creatinine level was 1.2 mg/dL on admission, previous level was 0.9 mg/dL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased to 2.0 mg/dL after complications post-surgery.

other_tests.findings: Noted to have difficulty using his right hand and was not speaking clearly.
